27.eng-name: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives
27.ara-name: كتاب البر والصلة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Al-Bara' bin Azib narrated that :the Prophet said: "The maternal aunt holds the same status as the mother

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي بِرِّ الْخَالَةِ
chapter.eng-name: About Being Dutiful To The Maternal Aunt

hadiths.text: (Another chain) From Ibn 'Umar:A man came to the Prophet (ﷺ) and said: "O Messenger of Allah! I have been afflicted by a tremendous sin. Is there any repentance for me?" He said: "Do you have your mother?" The man said: "No." He said: "Do you have any maternal aunts?" The man said: "Yes." He said: "Then be dutiful to them

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي بِرِّ الْخَالَةِ
chapter.eng-name: About Being Dutiful To The Maternal Aunt

hadiths.text: (Another chain) From Abu Bakr bin Hafs, from the Prophet (ﷺ), and it is similar, but he did not mention "from Ibn `Umar" in it. This is more correct than the Hadith of Abu Mu'awiyah, and Abu Bakr bin Hafs is Ibn 'Umar bin Sa'd bin Abi Waqqas (narrators in the chain of this Hadith)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي بِرِّ الْخَالَةِ
chapter.eng-name: About Being Dutiful To The Maternal Aunt
